description.english: You've proved yourself worthy of winning the lottery
description.french: Vous vous êtes montré digne d'avoir gagné la loterie
description.italian: Hai dimostrato di meritare la vittoria alla lotteria
description.koreana: 복권에 당첨될 가치가 있다는 것을 증명했습니다
description.german: Du hast dich als würdig erwiesen, im Lotto zu gewinnen
description.spanish: Has demostrado ser merecedor de ganar la lotería
description.russian: Вы доказали, что достойны выиграть в лотерею
description.japanese: あなたは抽選に当たる価値があることを証明しました
description.brazilian: Você se mostrou digno de ganhar na loteria
description.schinese: 你证明了自己配得上成为抽奖活动的赢家。

description.english: Able to repair all household items
description.french: Capable de réparer tous les objets de la maison
description.italian: In grado di riparare tutti gli oggetti di casa
description.german: In der Lage, alle Haushaltsgegenstände zu reparieren
description.spanish: Capaz de reparar todos los artículos del hogar
description.russian: Умеет ремонтировать все предметы домашнего обихода
description.japanese: 家じゅうのあらゆる物を修理できる
description.brazilian: Capaz de consertar todos os itens domésticos
description.schinese: 能修理所有家居用品

description.english: The little hands of the laboratories! We all know that it's the PhD students who do all the work!
description.french: Les petites mains des laboratoires ! On sait bien que ce sont les thésards qui font tout le boulot !
description.italian: Le piccole mani dei laboratori! Sappiamo che sono i dottorandi a svolgere tutti i lavori!
description.koreana: 실험실의 작은 손! 박사 과정 학생들이 모든 일을 한다는 걸 모두 압니다!
description.german: Die kleinen Hände der Labors! Wir alle wissen, dass es die Doktoranden sind, die die ganze Arbeit machen!
description.spanish: ¡Las manos de los laboratorios! ¡Todo el mundo sabe que son los estudiantes de doctorado los que hacen todo el trabajo!
description.russian: Подручные наших лабораторий! Мы все знаем, что именно аспиранты делают всю работу!
description.japanese: 実験室のお手伝い！仕事をするのはPhD学生だってみんな知ってます！
description.brazilian: O faz-tudo dos laboratórios! Todos sabemos que são os estudantes de doutorado que fazem todo o trabalho!
description.schinese: 实验室的小帮手！众所周知，干活的都是博士生！

description.english: Isaac Asimov would be proud of you
description.french: Isaac Asimov serait fier de vous
description.italian: Isaac Asimov sarebbe fiero di te
description.koreana: 아이작 아시모프는 당신을 자랑스러워 할 것입니다
description.german: Isaac Asimov wäre stolz auf dich
description.spanish: Isaac Asimov se sentiría orgulloso de ti
description.japanese: アイザック・アシモフもあなたを誇りに思うでしょう
description.brazilian: Isaac Asimov se orgulharia de você
description.schinese: 艾萨克·阿西莫夫会为你感到骄傲的

description.english: Without you, everything would have fallen apart
description.french: Sans vous, tout aurait été détruit
description.italian: Senza di te, tutto cadrebbe come un castello di carte
description.koreana: 당신이 없다면 모든 것이 무너졌을 것입니다
description.german: Ohne dich wäre alles zusammengebrochen
description.spanish: Sin ti, todo se habría ido al traste
description.japanese: あなたがいなかったら、全ては破壊されていたでしょう
description.brazilian: Sem você, tudo teria desmoronado
description.schinese: 世界离不开你

description.english: Only the bravest join the resistance
description.french: Seuls les plus courageux rejoignent la résistance
description.italian: Solo i più coraggiosi si uniscono alla resistenza
description.german: Nur die Mutigsten schließen sich dem Widerstand an
description.spanish: Solo los más valientes se unen a la resistencia
description.russian: Только самые храбрые присоединяются к сопротивлению
description.japanese: レジスタンスに参加できるのは最も勇気のある者たちだけ
description.brazilian: Apenas os mais corajosos se juntam à resistência
description.schinese: 只有最勇敢的人才会加入抵抗组织

description.english: You have to see things as they are, not as they should be
description.french: Il faut voir les choses telles qu'elles sont, pas comme elles devraient être
description.italian: Devi saper vedere il mondo per quello che è, non per ciò che dovrebbe essere
description.koreana: 사물을 그래야 하는 모습이 아니라 있는 그대로 보세요
description.german: Man muss die Dinge sehen, wie sie sind, nicht wie sie sein sollten
description.spanish: Hay que ver las cosas como son, no como deberían ser
description.russian: Вы должны видеть вещи такими, какие они есть, а не такими, какими они должны быть
description.japanese: 物事は、あるべき姿ではなく、あるがままの姿を見なければならない
description.brazilian: Você precisa ver as coisas como elas são, não como deveriam ser
description.schinese: 你必须看透事物的本质，而非表象

description.english: King of connection
description.french: Roi de la connexion
description.italian: Re delle connessioni
description.german: König der Verbindung
description.spanish: Rey de las conexiones
description.japanese: コネクションの王者
description.brazilian: O rei das conexões
description.schinese: 连接之王

description.english: Size isn't everything
description.french: Il n'y a pas que la taille qui compte
description.italian: Le dimensioni non sono tutto
description.german: Größe ist nicht alles
description.spanish: El tamaño no lo es todo
description.japanese: 大事なのはサイズだけじゃない
description.brazilian: Tamanho não importa
description.schinese: 重要的不是大小

description.english: Attractive duck
description.french: Joli canard
description.italian: Papera ammaliante
description.german: Attraktive Ente
description.spanish: Patito atractivo
description.japanese: かわいいアヒル
description.brazilian: Pato atraente
description.schinese: 迷人的鸭子

description.english: What are you doing with that plastic duck?
description.french: Mais que faites-vous avec ce canard en plastique ?
description.italian: Che cosa stai facendo con quella papera di plastica?
description.german: Was machst du mit der Plastik-Ente?
description.spanish: ¿Qué haces con ese patito de goma?
description.russian: Что ты делаешь с этой пластиковой уткой?
description.japanese: このプラスチックのアヒルで何してるんですか？
description.brazilian: O que está fazendo com esse pato de borracha?
description.schinese: 你拿着那个塑料鸭子干什么

description.english: An apple a day keeps the doctor away
description.french: « Mangez des pommes » Jacques C.
description.italian: Una mela al giorno toglie il medico di torno
description.koreana: 하루에 사과 한 알을 먹으면 의사 볼 일이 없습니다
description.german: Ein Apfel am Tag hält dir den Arzt vom Leib
description.spanish: La manzana nos reveló la gravedad
description.russian: По яблоку в день, и доктор не понадобится
description.japanese: 1日1個のリンゴは医者を遠ざける
description.brazilian: Uma maçã por dia mantém o médico longe
description.schinese: 每日一苹果，医生远离我

displayName.french: Manger 5 fruits et légumes par jour
displayName.italian: Mangia 5 porzioni di frutta e verdura al giorno
displayName.german: Iss 5 Portionen Obst und Gemüse pro Tag
displayName.spanish: Comer cinco porciones de fruta y verdura al día
displayName.russian: Съедайте 5 порций фруктов и овощей в день
displayName.japanese: 1日につき5つの果物と野菜を食べること
displayName.brazilian: Coma 5 porções de frutas e vegetais num dia
displayName.schinese: 每天吃 5 份水果和蔬菜

description.english: Eat 5 portions of fruit and vegetables a day
description.french: Pour une bonne santé
description.italian: Per una buona salute
description.german: Für gute Gesundheit
description.spanish: Para conservar la salud
description.japanese: 健康に役立ちます
description.brazilian: Para ter boa saúde
description.schinese: 有益健康

description.english: I'm not a toy!
description.french: Je ne suis pas un jouet !
description.italian: Non sono un giocattolo!
description.german: Ich bin kein Spielzeug!
description.spanish: ¡No soy un juguete!
description.japanese: 私はおもちゃじゃありません！
description.brazilian: Não sou brinquedo!
description.schinese: 我可不是玩具！

description.english: Uh, I may have made a little mistake!
description.french: Euh, j'ai peut-être fait une petite bêtise !
description.italian: Oh, potrei aver commesso un piccolo errore!
description.german: Äh, ich habe vielleicht einen kleinen Fehler gemacht!
description.spanish: ¡Uh, puede que haya metido un poco la pata!
description.japanese: ちょっとミスしちゃったかも！
description.brazilian: Acho que errei uma coisinha!
description.schinese: 呃，我可能犯了个小错误！

description.english: You can't make an omelette without breaking eggs
description.french: On ne fait pas d'omelette sans casser des œufs
description.italian: Non si riesce a preparare una frittata senza rompere le uova
description.koreana: 달걀을 깨지 않으면 오믈렛을 만들 수 없습니다
description.german: Man kann kein Omelett machen, ohne Eier zu zerschlagen
description.spanish: No se puede hacer una tortilla sin romper unos huevos
description.russian: Не разбив яиц, омлет не приготовишь
description.japanese: 卵を割らずにオムレツを作ることはできない
description.brazilian: Não se pode fazer uma omelete sem quebrar os ovos
description.schinese: 没有金刚钻别揽瓷器活

description.english: Connections don't grow on trees
description.french: Les connexions ne tombent pas du ciel
description.italian: Le connessioni non crescono sugli alberi
description.german: Verbindungen wachsen nicht auf Bäumen
description.spanish: Las conexiones no crecen en los árboles
description.japanese: コネクションは空から降ってくるものじゃない
description.brazilian: Conexões não crescem em árvores
description.schinese: 连接可不会自己长出来

description.english: A rebel who doesn't follow orders
description.french: Un rebelle qui ne suit pas les ordres établis
description.italian: Un ribelle che non segue gli ordini
description.german: Ein Rebell, der keine Befehle befolgt
description.spanish: Un rebelde que no obedece órdenes
description.japanese: 決められた指示に従わない反逆者
description.brazilian: Um rebelde que não segue ordens
description.schinese: 不服从命令的叛乱者

description.english: It'll be paid for with a meal ticket
description.french: Ce sera payé en tickets resto
description.italian: Verrà pagato in buoni pasto
description.german: Es wird mit Essensmarken bezahlt
description.spanish: Se pagarán en cheques restaurante
description.russian: Это будет оплачено талонами на питание
description.japanese: 支払いは食券で
description.brazilian: Será pago em ticket alimentação
description.schinese: 餐券就当加班费了

description.english: To infinity and beyond!
description.french: Vers l'infini et au-delà !
description.italian: Oltre l'infinito!
description.german: Bis zur Unendlichkeit und noch viel weiter!
description.spanish: ¡Hasta el infinito y más allá!
description.japanese: 無限の彼方へ！
description.brazilian: Ao infinito e além!
description.schinese: 飞向宇宙，无限循环！

description.english: Keep your curiosity sharp
description.french: La curiosité est l'inverse d'un vilain défaut
description.italian: Coltiva la tua curiosità
description.german: Halte deine Neugierde aufrecht
description.spanish: La curiosidad es cualquier cosa menos un defecto
description.japanese: 好奇心は悪い事じゃない
description.brazilian: Uma olhadinha não faz mal a ninguém
description.schinese: 保留一份好奇心

description.english: I like to finish my work properly
description.french: J'aime accomplir mes tâches comme il se doit
description.italian: Mi piace svolgere un lavoro correttamente
description.german: Ich mag es, meine Arbeit ordentlich zu beenden
description.spanish: Me encanta hacer bien mi trabajo
description.russian: Я люблю завершать работу должным образом
description.japanese: 自分の仕事はきちんと終わらせたい
description.brazilian: Gosto de fazer bem o meu trabalho
description.schinese: 我喜欢按部就班地完成工作

displayName.french: Je ne suis pas ton larbin
displayName.japanese: あなたの手先じゃないんです

description.english: When injustice becomes law, resistance becomes duty
description.french: Quand la tyrannie devient loi, la rébellion devient devoir
description.italian: Quando l'ingiustizia diventa legge, la resistenza è un dovere
description.german: Wenn Ungerechtigkeit zum Gesetz wird, wird Widerstand zur Pflicht
description.spanish: Cuando la injusticia es la ley, la resistencia es un deber
description.russian: Когда несправедливость становится законом, сопротивление становится долгом
description.japanese: 暴政が法律となった時、抵抗は義務となる
description.brazilian: Quando a injustiça se torna lei, resistir se torna um dever
description.schinese: 当不义成为定律，反抗就成为了人们的使命

description.english: A very fine distinction
description.french: Une très belle distinction
description.italian: Una sottile distinzione
description.german: Ein sehr feiner Unterschied
description.spanish: Una bonita distinción
description.japanese: 素晴らしき栄誉
description.brazilian: Bela distinção
description.schinese: 细微差别

description.english: You'll jinx us
description.french: Tu vas nous porter la poisse
description.italian: Ci porterai sfortuna
description.german: Du wirst uns verhexen
description.spanish: Nos vas a gafar
description.japanese: 不幸をもたらす気か
description.brazilian: Vai atrapalhar tudo
description.schinese: 你会给我们带来霉运

description.english: Your first creation, other players will (surely) love it!
description.french: Votre première création, les autres joueurs vont (sûrement) l'adorer !
description.italian: La tua prima creazione, gli altri giocatori la adoreranno!
description.koreana: 다른 플레이어들이 당신의 첫 작품을 좋아할 것입니다!
description.german: Deine erste Kreation, die anderen Spielern (sicher) gefallen wird!
description.spanish: ¡Tu primera creación! ¡A los otros jugadores (seguramente) les encantará!
description.russian: Ваше первое творение, другие игроки полюбят (конечно же) его!
description.japanese: あなたの最初の作品。他のプレイヤーも（必ずや）気に入ります！
description.brazilian: A sua primeira criação, os outros jogadores vão (com certeza) amar!
description.schinese: 你的第一份作品，其他玩家一定（肯定）会喜欢的！

displayName.italian: Condividere vuol dire prendersi cura degli altri...
displayName.japanese: あげたものはあげたもの…
displayName.brazilian: Dividir é um ato de amor…

description.english: Your level is now my level! (mwahahaha)
description.french: Ton niveau est maintenant le mien ! (rire de méchant)
description.italian: Il mio livello è ora pari al tuo! (mwahahaha)
description.german: Dein Level ist jetzt mein Level! (mwahahaha)
description.spanish: ¡Tu nivel es ahora mi nivel! (risa de malvado)
description.japanese: あなたのレベルは私のレベル！（フフフ）
description.brazilian: O seu nível é o meu nível agora! (muahahaha)
description.schinese: 你的关卡现在是我的了！（哇哈哈哈哈）

description.english: The perfect puzzle player
description.french: Le joueur de puzzle game parfait
description.italian: Il perfetto risolutore di enigmi
description.german: Der perfekte Puzzlespieler
description.spanish: El jugador de rompecabezas perfecto
description.japanese: 完璧なパズルゲームプレイヤー
description.brazilian: O jogador perfeito de quebra-cabeças
description.schinese: 完美的解谜玩家

displayName.japanese: やっと文明人が現れた

description.english: The whole team thanks you for your interest in the designers ;)
description.french: Toute l'équipe te remercie de t'intéresser aux créateurs ;)
description.italian: L'intero team ti ringrazia per il tuo interesse nei progettisti ;)
description.koreana: 디자이너에게 관심을 보여주셔서 모든 팀이 감사 드립니다 ;)
description.german: Das gesamte Team dankt dir für dein Interesse an den Designern ;)
description.spanish: Todo el equipo te agradece tu interés por los diseñadores ;)
description.russian: Вся команда благодарит вас за проявленный интерес ;)
description.japanese: クリエーターに興味を持ってくれたことを、チーム一同感謝申し上げます ;)
description.brazilian: Toda a equipe te agradece pelo interesse nos designers ;)
description.schinese: 团队全体人员感谢你对游戏制作者的关注 ;)

displayName.japanese: ジャイロ・ギアルース

description.english: If it's pluggable, I'll make it work for you
description.german: Wenn es anschlussfähig ist, werde ich es für dich zum Laufen bringen
description.french: Si ça se branche, je vous le fais fonctionner
description.italian: Se si può attaccare, lo farò funzionare
description.koreana: 플러그 할 수 있으면 작동하게 만들겠습니다
description.spanish: Si se puede enchufar, lograré que funcione
description.schinese: 只要是插电的，我都能修好。
description.russian: Если его можно подключить, я сделаю так, чтобы он заработал для вас
description.japanese: 接続できるんなら、やってあげますよ
description.brazilian: Se tem um plug, farei funcionar para você

description.english: You're joining the greats of this world, before it becomes a car
description.french: Tu rejoins les grands de ce monde, avant qu'il devienne une voiture
description.italian: Uno dei più grandi di questo mondo, prima di diventare un'automobile
description.koreana: 자동차가 되기 전, 세상의 위대한 사람들과 합류하는 것입니다
description.german: Du schließt dich den Großen dieser Welt an, bevor es ein Auto wird
description.spanish: Te unes a los genios de este mundo, antes de que te conviertan en coche
description.russian: Вы присоединитесь к великим мира сего, пока он не стал машиной
description.japanese: この世界がクルマになってしまう前に、偉人の仲間にお入りなさい
description.brazilian: Você está se juntando aos gênios do mundo, antes que te transformem num carro
description.schinese: 在特斯拉成为汽车品之前，你正在加入这个世界的伟大人物之列

description.english: You created the T-1000, didn't you?
description.german: Du hast den T-1000 erschaffen, nicht wahr?
description.french: C'est toi qui as créé le T-1000, non ?
description.italian: Hai creato tu il T-1000, vero?
description.spanish: Tú creaste el T-1000, ¿verdad?
description.schinese: 你是不是制造了 T-1000？
description.japanese: T-1000を作ったのは君じゃないのか？
description.brazilian: Foi você que criou o T1000, não foi?

description.english: And these are real bombs, not a flag in a box
description.german: Und es handelt sich um echte Bomben, nicht um eine Flagge in einer Schachtel
description.french: Et là ce sont des vraies bombes, pas un drapeau dans une case
description.italian: E queste sono vere bombe, non bandierine in una scatola
description.koreana: 상자 안의 깃발이 아니라 진짜 폭탄입니다
description.spanish: Y estas bombas son de verdad, no una bandera en una caja
description.schinese: 这些是货真价实的炸弹，可不是在盒子里的小旗子
description.russian: И это настоящие бомбы, а не флаг в коробке
description.japanese: でもここでは本物の爆弾であって、マスに立てる旗じゃありません
description.brazilian: E essas bombas são reais, não uma bandeira vermelha num quadrado

description.english: It's easy to brag about your martini, but it's hard to get all that information discreetly
description.german: Es ist leicht, mit seinem Martini zu prahlen, aber es ist schwer, all diese Informationen auf diskrete Weise zu erhalten
description.french: C'est facile de fanfaronner avec son martini, ça l'est moins de récupérer discrètement toutes ces informations
description.italian: È facile vantarsi del tuo Martini, ma non lo è altrettanto ottenere in modo discreto tutte quelle informazioni
description.koreana: 마티니를 자랑하기는 쉽지만 모든 정보를 신중히 얻기는 어렵습니다
description.spanish: Es fácil fanfarronear con tu martini, pero no lo es obtener toda esa información discretamente
description.schinese: 摇晃着你的马提尼酒杯很容易，但悄悄地获取所有信息却很难。
description.russian: Легко хвастаться своим мартини, но трудно получить всю эту информацию незаметно
description.japanese: 自分のマルティーニを作るのは簡単だが、情報を全部こっそりかき集めるのは簡単じゃない
description.brazilian: Ficar se achando com o seu vésper martíni é fácil, o difícil é conseguir tanta informação assim em segredo

description.english: But be careful, the birds aren't real
description.french: Mais faites attention, les oiseaux ne sont pas réels
description.italian: Fai attenzione, gli uccellini non sono veri
description.german: Aber Vorsicht, die Vögel sind nicht echt
description.spanish: Pero ten cuidado: los pájaros no son de verdad
description.japanese: でも気を付けて。鳥たちは本物ではありませんから
description.brazilian: Mas tome cuidado, os pássaros não são reais
description.schinese: 但要小心，这可不是真正的鸟

description.english: They were scattered everywhere
description.french: Ils ont été dispersés un peu partout
description.italian: Erano sparsi dappertutto
description.german: Sie wurden überall verteilt
description.spanish: Estaban un poco por todas partes
description.japanese: 色んな所に散らばっていた
description.brazilian: Estavam espalhados por toda a parte
description.schinese: 他们分布在各地
